name: USCoreReqCapStmtResponder
title: US Core 4.0.0 Requirements for US Core Responder CapabilityStatement
description: US Core 4.0.0 Requirements for US Core Responder returning CapabilityStatement

statement.label: us-core-req-capstmt-responder-01
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHALL** support the secured HTTP (https) protocol and the use of TLS 1.2 or higher when returning the responder's CapabilityStatement.

statement.label: us-core-req-capstmt-responder-02
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHALL** indicate support for the FHIR JSON format in the responder's CapabilityStatement.

statement.label: us-core-req-capstmt-responder-03
statement.requirement: The US Core Responder **SHALL** support the US Core Patient resource profile and at least one additional resource profile from the list of US Core Profiles.
